activeRewardsLearn.whatIsDesc: Active Rewards lets you earn rewards by forecasting the price of crypto. Payouts settle every Friday at 8:00 AM UTC.
activeRewardsLearn.benefitsDesc: Active Rewards offers a higher rewards rate than Passive Rewards, Staking Rewards, or simply holding crypto.
activeRewardsLearn.risksDesc: While Active Rewards offers fixed weekly rewards, market movements may reduce your crypto balance.
activeRewardsLearn.howItWorksDesc: Every week, Active Rewards sets a trigger price for crypto assets that is higher than the market price. If you believe the price will be under the trigger price at the end of the week, you can subscribe to a strategy that pays weekly rewards at an annual rate.
activeRewardsLearn.scenario1: Scenario 1 - Price of BTC is at or lower than trigger price.
activeRewardsLearn.scenario1Desc: You will receive your rewards for the week and be re-subscribed for the next week.

questions.0: What is a Passive Rewards Account and how does it work?
questions.1: Who is eligible for a Passive Rewards Account with Blockchain.com?
questions.2: What is the minimum amount required for a Passive Rewards Account?
questions.3: How frequently do I earn Passive Rewards?
questions.4: When can I withdraw my crypto from my Passive Rewards Account?

answers.0: A Passive Rewards Account is a crypto storage facility that earns rewards on the crypto you hold in it.
answers.1: Full access verification is required for a Passive Rewards Account. You must also be in a supported country. Learn more about Passive Rewards Account eligibility here.
answers.2: You can transfer as little as $1 to a Passive Rewards Account to start earning rewards.
answers.3: Passive Rewards are earned daily and paid monthly directly into your Passive Rewards Account.
answers.4: You can withdraw your crypto at any time after the initial 7-day withdrawal hold.

questions.0: What is staking and how does it work?
questions.1: Who is eligible for staking with Blockchain.com?
questions.2: What is the minimum amount required for staking?
questions.3: How frequently do I earn Staking Rewards?
questions.4: When can I withdraw my crypto from my Staking Rewards Account?

answers.0: Staking is the process used by Proof-of-Stake (PoS) blockchains to verify and secure transactions on their networks. Participants put up or "stake" their crypto for a chance to validate transactions and earn rewards.
answers.1: Full Access verification is required for staking. You must also be in a supported country. Learn more about staking eligibility here.
answers.2: You can transfer as little as $1 to a Staking Rewards Account to start earning rewards.
answers.3: Depending on the protocol, your crypto may be subject to a bonding period before generating rewards. Once bonded, rewards are earned and paid daily directly into your Staking Rewards Account.
answers.4: Withdrawal availability and unbonding periods are determined by the protocol. You can withdraw your crypto once withdrawals are available and the unbonding period has passed.

questions.1: Who is eligible for Active Rewards?
questions.2: What is the minimum amount required for Active Rewards?
questions.3: How frequently do I earn Active Rewards?
questions.4: When can I withdraw my crypto from my Active Rewards Account?

answers.0: Active Rewards lets you earn rewards by forecasting the price of crypto.
answers.1: Full Access verification is required for Active Rewards. You must also be in a supported country. Learn more about Active Rewards eligibility here.
answers.2: You can transfer as little as $1 to an Active Rewards Account to start earning rewards.
answers.3: Every Friday at 8am UTC, your weekly rewards payout is transferred to your Active Rewards Account.
answers.4: You can request a full withdrawal of your funds at any time. Your funds will be transferred to your Trading Account once the active strategy ends and rewards payouts are made.

legal.risk: Risk Disclosure: Purchasing crypto involves substantial risk of loss. The value of crypto can be volatile and may decrease significantly. You may lose some or all of your capital. Past performance is not indicative of future results.
legal.disclaimer: Digital Currency Disclaimer: Digital currencies are not bank deposits, are not legal tender, and are not backed by any government. Blockchain.com's products are not subject to governmental deposit protection schemes. Regulatory changes may affect the value of digital currencies.

hero.title: Relentlessly building the future of finance since 2011
hero.description: The world's leading crypto finance house serving people, projects, protocols and institutions since 2011.

team.title: Meet the team
team.description: Global management team with over 200 years of combined experience at some of the most reputable financial institutions, technology companies, and startups.

5.name: Tim Lubans
5.role: Chief Legal Officer & Interim Chief Compliance Officer

company.title: About Blockchain.com
company.description: We believe that in a decade the financial system of the internet — that is, commerce that happens on the internet — will be the largest financial system in the world. And it will be powered by crypto.
company.paragraph1: Blockchain.com got its start as an early pioneer of key infrastructure for the bitcoin community. First, with a Blockchain Explorer that enabled anyone to not only examine transactions and study the blockchain, but an API that enabled companies to build on Bitcoin. We also have provided the most popular and widely used crypto wallet that enables anyone anywhere to control their own money.
company.paragraph2: Our team spans the globe and has worked tirelessly to accelerate the adoption of crypto and usher in the future of finance. We are passionate, relentless, and stoked -- and believe that a lean team of world-class visionaries can ship products that empower our customers and drive the business to new heights.

investors.title: Investors
investors.subtitle: Backed by renowned investors from Silicon Valley, Wall Street, and London.

hero.title: Working at Blockchain.com
hero.description: We take our work seriously, relentlessly pursue excellence, and have fun doing hard things together.

values.title: Blockstar Core Values
values.description: The core values of Blockchain.com are relentless problem solving, building like an owner, being a team player, communicating with candor, and embracing an infinite mindset.

0.title: Be relentless
0.description: A journey into uncharted territory doesn't come without challenges. Don't give up. Stay in the fight. Find a way.

1.title: Build like an owner
1.description: Remember: we're a startup, first and last. Have a bias for action. Take pride in what you ship. Raise the bar.

2.title: Be a team player
2.description: Put teamwork and the mission above your ego. Be willing to lend a hand. Ask for help when you need it.

3.title: Communicate with candor
3.description: Realize the best ideas are forged by fire. Challenge ideas respectfully when you disagree. See giving and getting feedback as a gift.

4.title: Embrace an infinite mindset
4.description: Know that building the financial system of the future will take decades. Aim for long term impact over short term gains. Set audacious goals. Don't be afraid to take risks.

hero.title: Press & Media
hero.description: Blockchain.com is the world's most trusted platform for transacting in crypto. Whether it's trading, earning rewards, checking payment status, or lending crypto, Blockchain.com offers the most established and widely-used way to invest in cryptocurrency for tens of millions of customers in nearly 100+ countries.
hero.socialText: To hear our latest news, follow

0.headline: Blockchain.com names co-CEO as it opens a new US headquarters in Dallas
0.summary: Blockchain.com announced Lane Kasselman will now serve as Co-CEO alongside Peter Smith will continue to serve as the company's CEO, Founder, and Executive Chairman.

1.headline: Blockchain.com secures MICA license, hires Malta insider to head EU expansion
1.summary: With the license, Blockchain.com is enabled to provide custody and wallet services in 27 EEA countries and plans to roll out institutional services.

2.headline: Blockchain.com expands institutional offerings amid regulatory clarity
2.summary: Blockchain.com continues to grow its institutional product suite, offering custody and trading solutions to regulated entities worldwide.

3.headline: Blockchain.com reports record user growth and exchange volume
3.summary: The platform announced significant milestones in monthly active users and trading volume, reinforcing its position as a leading crypto company.

hero.title: Ventures
hero.description: Blockchain Ventures is a venture capital fund and a subsidiary of Blockchain.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Blockchain Ventures is a venture capital fund and a subsidiary of Blockchain. We created Blockchain Ventures to support and invest in distributed ledger technology (DLT) projects that advance the industry and provide positive societal impact. With support from its parent company, Blockchain Ventures aims to contribute to the creation of an open, fair, and accessible financial system and promote DLT use-cases that are revolutionary beyond finance.

valueAdd.title: Our Value Add
valueAdd.description: With over 100M wallets created on the platform, Blockchain is one of the most trusted brands in crypto. We invest in equity and token projects and provide them with legal, security, technical, and financial support from our talented bench of employees, partners, and advisors.
